content.rendered: WCRC Leaders Asia (World Consulting & Research Corporation) which is a Leading Marketing Research Firm and Magazine for Asian Leaders – pronounced to recognize and showcase the Most Promising Brands and Leaders from various Asian countries that have contributed to the scintillating Asian success story and charted a path-breaking progression blueprint of the Asian economy. WCRC has recently featured Digiperform’s views in their Online Publication Report which is solely dedicated to the section – Breakthrough Ideas 2018 – from the leaders across the country – by one of the Founders of Digiperform – Manu Jolly. The article stressing about why “More than 60% of buying online occurs based on the reviews that are seen online.” He believes that “With over 84% 4G network availability, India has emerged as the strong and high potential country in terms of Digitalization and has been constantly on the parallel path to break all the barriers in online marketing. Where the Buyer of India is Digital already, incorporating Digital Marketing Training will help to understand the mindset of online consumers for designing better Online Business Strategies.” Click here to read out the full article: http://wcrcleaders.com/digiperform-2/
